name: Himari vs Monika
description:
This is a game where you control my OC, Himari, and you must press the delete button to delete Monika at the end of the level.

This is the first game I make with Himari.

Not maded in Unity this time, was maded using Godot Engine 3.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow = move Himari

Up Arrow = jump

X + Left or Right Arrow = run

C = Cast Power when you collect powers

F = toggle fullscreen or windowed

Enter = Pause

Background Music: Seina - Witch's Diary (I believe it's no copyright, anything I change the music to avoid problems):

YouTube

YouTube2

Source Code:

GitHub

if you are experiencing slowness with game (low FPS), I suggest playing using Chromium based browser (Chrome, Edge, ...) with Hardware Acceleration enabled.

Monika belongs to Team Salvato
